Title: 38988 - Eat Healthier With # Smart Apps
Direction: 675 Words: List 4-8 apps that will help users create and maintain a healthier diet. Avoid apps focused on exercise or purely counting calories. Instead, highlight those that offer more in-depth information and suggestions that will support users who want informative actionable content that will help them figure out exactly what to eat to improve their health. Write for health-conscious consumers. Include the anchor text in a section discussing an iOS app and how that app will work well on an iPhone.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: tracking healthy eating on your iPhone 5S from T-Mobile

Title: 38990 - # iPhone Apps Every Professional Needs
Direction: 675 Words, List 4-8 business apps that iPhone users should download. Focus on apps with a broad appeal for business users and offer several examples of how they can be used for different industries or types of business tasks. Write for a professional audience looking to increase productivity. Place the anchor text with an explanation of how an iPhone is ideally suited to busy professionals.
Anchor Text: iphone 6s plus unrelated keyword (this could be “more information”, “click here”)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: viewed on a 5.5" Retina HD display

Title: 38992 - # Outstanding Things You Can Do on the iPad Pro
Direction: 675 Words, list 4-8 impressive things that you can do using apps that are designed for the iPad Pro. Rather than highlighting the app itself with each subheading, call out a specific task that you can do with this tablet, then go on to explain one or more apps that let you do it and how you can accomplish each job. Your audience is a diverse blend of readers who are interested in new tech. Include the anchor text with an explanation of some of the features of the iPad Pro.
Anchor Text: ipad pro unrelated keyword (this could be “more information”, “click here”)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: the largest screen yet

Title: 38993 - Need Extra Money? Try These # Apps
Direction: 675 words: Create a list of 4-8 apps that are useful for earning extra cash without a lot of effort. Offer a range of different apps, like rebate and coupon apps, investment apps, and survey apps, rather than focusing on a single type. Write for an audience of college graduates who are tech-savvy, but don't have much extra time to invest in side jobs. The target URL will work in a section when discussing the benefits of using a particular Android app on the LG V10.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: connect quickly to this app from your LG V10
